structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

law.catch_line: Appellate Procedures for Civil Penalty—First-Time Violator; Time for correction.

text.section:
Sec. 19-4.4. Appellate Procedures for Civil Penalty—First-Time Violator; Time for correction.
For first-time violators receiving a civil violation notice, the owner, or other responsible party, shall have fourteen (14) calendar days from service of the notice pursuant to Miami-Dade County Code(c) to correct the violation, or seven (7) calendar days from service to file for an appeal. The appeal shall be in the manner described within the Uniform Civil Violation Notice.
